snippet: A Hong Kong-based mobile software company has created an app that allows people to indulge in both gaming and an interest in all things Occupy, featuring protesters facing off against thugs, police officers with tear gas and pepper spray, anti-Occupy...
abstract: A Hong Kong-based mobile software company has created an app that allows people to indulge in both gaming and an interest in all things Occupy, featuring protesters facing off against thugs, police officers with tear gas and pepper spray, anti-Occupy demonstrators wearing blue ribbons and a character who resembles the city’s chief executive, Leung Chun-ying.

headline.main: Programmers Deploy Cellphone Game to Support Hong Kong Protests
